Html:
Greetings Everyone!

I'm new with PHPexcel and Oracle DB. So I would appreciate if anyone could give me a complete PHP code example to export data from Oracle DB to Excel using PHPexcel. Fyi, I've tested few scripts but ended with so many errors/empty excel.

Thanks so much for helping me.

Can you verify that you are getting the data from the Oracle Database into PHP variables or array?

If you can you could post that code here and I'm sure there would be several who could help you from that point on. But you need to establish that you are getting the data out of the database first.

-- Christopher Mullins
